sentences: Søren Hyldgaard (6 August 1962 – 7 May 2018) was a Danish film composer, also known for several New Age albums and for his concerts.
Hyldgaard received a prestigious artistic acknowledgement award from the San Diego Film Commission in Southern California for his achievements in film scoring.
His Hollywood debut came with the 2008 thriller Red, starring Brian Cox.
Concerto for Bass Trombone and Orchestra (2015), written for soloist Stefan Schulz, Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra
